*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Gaines to Austin, August 21, 1826. Inquiries concerning disturbing rumors. Slavery.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-21-1826">August 21st 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Steven F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear *person_mentioned*Colonel */person_mentioned*I beg leave to call on you for information on certain points Relative to the Conduct of some of your *person_mentioned*people*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*when *person_mentioned*Col Pettis*/person_mentioned* was at *location_mentioned*Ayish Bayou*/location_mentioned* he asserted there was no law nor authority in *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*and that *person_mentioned*Jose Anty Sauceda Esqr*/person_mentioned*. had no authority to do what he Done and that your *person_mentioned*Honer */person_mentioned*had Command to the *location_mentioned*River Sabine*/location_mentioned* by which he stimulated the *person_mentioned*Opposers of the Law*/person_mentioned* and authority to Raise a *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*for that purpose promising them you would Recognize them for which *person_mentioned*John A Williams*/person_mentioned* went to the *location_mentioned*Brassos*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*And by the Last mail *person_mentioned*John Sprowl Esqr*/person_mentioned*. of the *location_mentioned*Ayish Bayou*/location_mentioned* has Recd a Letter as he states from *person_mentioned*Jesse Thomson*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Payton */person_mentioned*in the hand write of *person_mentioned*Joseph white*/person_mentioned* and Bound him to profound Secrecy on which the said *person_mentioned*Sprowl*/person_mentioned*s prophicied that *location_mentioned*one half of your Colony*/location_mentioned* and the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*here would be out of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*he was askd If they would be drove out he answered no they would go out of their Own accord I insisted on knowing If it was anything that might Effect the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*or the interest of the people he Refused to answer me But Told *person_mentioned*Mr. Thomas*/person_mentioned* It was the subject of Slavery and that no hope Remained on that Subject thereby Creating much Rumor*/p*
*p*from what I have seen and heard among the *person_mentioned*friends of Edwards*/person_mentioned* and many others and now from your *location_mentioned*Quarter */location_mentioned*I am led to believe something like a Revolution has been aimed at and probably yet on foot*/p*
*p*I beg you to write me on those points and Explain those particulars so as no more Confusion may arise to the injury of the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*nor here.*/p*
*p*Please inform me If *person_mentioned*Mr. David G Burnett*/person_mentioned* is yet with you he wrote me a Letter when I was sick and before I was able to answer I heard he had left your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, But If he should yet be with you give him my Compliments and inform him I am Ready to Correspond with him and serve him in all cases in my power agreeable to the Duty Of a *person_mentioned*friend*/person_mentioned**/p*
______ *person_mentioned*Jas Gaines*/person_mentioned*
*/div1*
